response.original_title: Scenes of TR at Sagamore Hill, 1912
response.overview: First film footage taken of TR at Sagamore Hill, summer of 1912. TR on his horse Sidar shakes hands with William P. Helm, Associated Press correspondent for New York City and Washington (1910-1918) and detailed by AP to Wilson and TR during the 1912 campaign. TR rides his horse away from Sagamore, returns to Sagamore, dismounts and feeds the horse from his hand, plays with his three dogs, and then reviews his mail assisted by his son Archie. Final scene of TR, with axe in hand, walking down the driveway.
response.title: Scenes of TR at Sagamore Hill, 1912

titles.title: Scenes of Theodore Roosevelt at Sagamore Hill, 1912
